content: pride mesh front crop top by seyhall crochet design mesh crochet hook 4mm yarn double knit cotton us crochet terms 3-chain turns count as a stitch 58cm / 23 wide each square adds or subtracts 1 5cm/ 116cm / 46 chest 5/8 to the chest size remember to add same number of extras on all sides front and back © copyright 2023 all images and text in this document are copyright to richard seymour and seyhall crochet design the pattern is intended for personal use only not commercial purposes you do not have the right to copy sell share translate to another language or publish the pattern or parts of the pattern you have the right to make items from this pattern for sale but you must link back to the original pattern and author back dc1-tr1-decrease need a collar you can find details of a simple collar in the free t-shirt pattern https //www seyhallcrochet yarn over yo insert hook in design com/plain-t-shirt next stitch st yo pull through three loops on hook yo pull through two loops on hook two loops left on hook yo twice skip chain space insert hook through stitch yo pull through four loops on hook yo pull through two © loops on hook three loops c o left on hook yo pull through p y r three loops on hook ig h t 2 0 2 3 s e y h a ll c r o c h e t d e s ig n
